createCategory(CategoryConfiguration) - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.ejb.bean.JiveForumServiceBean
Creates a new category according to the category configuration.
createCategory(CategoryConfiguration) - Method in interface com.topcoder.forum.service.ejb.JiveForumService
Creates a new category according to the category configuration.
createCategory(CategoryConfiguration) - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.ejb.mock.MockJiveForumService
Create Software Forums category from the given category configuration.
This method creates category logically, simply consumes the next category id, and if a Moderator User Id is specified, then a watch for the user is created for the category, its user role is also created for the category.
This method has been annotated with TransactionAttribute(TransactionAttributeType.REQUIRED).
createCategory(CategoryConfiguration) - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.JiveForumManager
Creates a new category according to the passed category configuration.

getUserRole(long, long) - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.ejb.bean.JiveForumServiceBean
Gets User Role for a Category.
getUserRole(long, long) - Method in interface com.topcoder.forum.service.ejb.JiveForumService
Gets the user's role in a category.
getUserRole(long, long) - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.ejb.mock.MockJiveForumService
Get User Role for a Category.
Given a user id and a category id, return whether the user has no access, is contributor or moderator, depending on the groups he belong.
UserRole.NO_ACCESS is returned if no user role is present.
Note that the user roles are stored in the userRoles variable.
This method has been annotated with TransactionAttribute(TransactionAttributeType.REQUIRED).
getUserRole(long, long) - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.JiveForumManager
Gets user's role for a category.
getVersionId() - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.CategoryConfiguration
Gets the version id.
getVersionText() - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.CategoryConfiguration
Gets the version text.

GROUP_SOFTWARE_USERS_PREFIX - Static variable in class com.topcoder.forum.service.JiveForumManager

isWatched(long, long, EntityType) - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.ejb.bean.JiveForumServiceBean
Gets whether a user is watching a category, forum or thread.
isWatched(long, long, EntityType) - Method in interface com.topcoder.forum.service.ejb.JiveForumService
Gets whether a user is watching a category, forum or thread.
isWatched(long, long, EntityType) - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.ejb.mock.MockJiveForumService
Get whether a user is watching a category, forum or thread.
Given a user id and either a category, forum or thread id, return whether the user is already watching it.
Note that the watches are only stored in the watches variable.
This method has been annotated with TransactionAttribute(TransactionAttributeType.REQUIRED).
isWatched(long, long, EntityType) - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.JiveForumManager
Gets whether a user is watching a category, forum or thread.

setUserRole(long, long, UserRole) - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.ejb.bean.JiveForumServiceBean
Sets User Role in Category.
setUserRole(long, long, UserRole) - Method in interface com.topcoder.forum.service.ejb.JiveForumService
Sets the user's role in the specified category.
setUserRole(long, long, UserRole) - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.ejb.mock.MockJiveForumService
Set User Role in Category.
Given a user id and a category id, one of these roles can be assigned.
If the role of the specified category for a user exists, it will be replaced by the new one.
No access: the user must not belong to moderators or users groups.
Contributor: the user must belong just to users group.
Moderator: the user must belong just to moderators group.
Note that the user roles are stored in the userRoles variable.
This method should be annotated with TransactionAttribute(TransactionAttributeType.REQUIRED).
setUserRole(long, long, UserRole) - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.JiveForumManager
Sets the user's role in Category.
setVersionId(long) - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.CategoryConfiguration
Sets the version id to the specified value.
setVersionText(String) - Method in class com.topcoder.forum.service.CategoryConfiguration
Sets the version text to the specified value.
SW_BLOCK_PERMS - Static variable in class com.topcoder.forum.service.JiveForumManager
The blocked permissions for annoymous users when the category is private.
